titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain deductions of school bus drivers shall be allowable in computing adjusted gross income.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8233)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction of certain expenses of school bus drivers in computing their adjusted gross income.
